name: Scary Shadow Spot: Bitter Glass
storyline: John Doe, a man with no memory, wanders for days through the desert, on the verge of survival. When all seems lost, he spots a remote saloon in the distance: the Bitter Glass. In search of water and shelter, John steps inside… only to find himself trapped in a place that seems alive and haunted by the souls of the dead. The ghosts inhabiting the saloon are members of the gang, the Demons of the Apocalypse, and they ask John to fulfill their last wishes to finally find peace. But a deeper mystery looms: who is John Doe? And why won’t these souls let him go?
summary: Scary Shadow Spot: Bitter Glass. Without memory, John Doe wanders the desert until he finds refuge in a haunted saloon. The ghosts of the past demand justice, and every clue brings him closer to an unsettling truth. Are you ready to uncover the secret of the Bitter Glass?
